FuncDef: The display l2nat vsuf status command displays information about L2NAT licenses assigned to a specific or all service boards on a device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E service board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To display information about L2NAT licenses assigned to a specific or all service boards on a device, run the display l2nat vsuf status command.
